ns2:test-suite.name: Admin Login Functionality - Online Shopping System
ns2:test-suite.title: Admin Login Functionality - Online Shopping System

test-case.name: should log in successfully with valid email and password
test-case.title: should log in successfully with valid email and password

test-case.name: should display error for invalid email or password
test-case.title: should display error for invalid email or password

test-case.name: should not allow login with empty email and password
test-case.title: should not allow login with empty email and password

test-case.name: should block SQL injection attempts in email and password
test-case.title: should block SQL injection attempts in email and password

test-case.name: should reject credentials with surrounding whitespaces if not trimmed
test-case.title: should reject credentials with surrounding whitespaces if not trimmed
